channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Left over trash from neighbours moving out, Thorburn Square, 8th January
item.description:
Our neighbours moved out on the 19th December and there are 5 bags of rubbish that have been left outside their door on the walkway - can these been removed and disposed of please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thorburn Square, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: Tree near 42 Ravenshaw Street, 8th January
item.description:
Camden had promised to pollard tree in October 2025 as it's causing subsidence issues to our property, but this has not been done. Insurance company has contacted Camden a few times last year. But still no response. Insurer Ref: 77623909612 DSAS Ref: 72229447 This is impacting sale of property. Is there anyway that this work can be expedited?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravenshaw Street, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain cover not replaced. 6 foot deep hole inches from pavement, 8th January
item.description:
On Monday evening (Jan 6th, 2026) the drain cover was removed, presumably by the Sewage workers, and not replaced. Itâ€™s currently leaning against a fence close by. The massive hole is inches from the pavement and possibly about 6 feet deep.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Nevill Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Stagnant water in neighbouring property, 8th January
item.description:
The standing water in the garden of a council property presents a clear health hazard, including potential mosquito/vector breeding, and is impacting the habitability of homes. The odour is causing headaches, nausea, and throat irritation.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pownall Road, Hackney, London
